page.title: 04THE VICAR
page.content: Mr Byron is a vicar who preaches at St Mary's and St Cyriac's churches, Swaffham Prior every Sunday. He has been a vicar for 35 years and at the churches since September 1974. There have been 30 vicars at the two churches in the past. Mr Byron is involved in a lot of activities in the village. Every Thursday he joins the Community school to help in classroom activities and to take assembly. He has lots of interesting clothes that he wears for different services. He has 10 people in the choir, 3 of them are in our class. There are normally about 25 people who go to Family Service and about 16 who go to the other services. The lowest number that can ever be remembered was 12 and that was on a very cold day.
